statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_id = 1001 AND car_model = 'Toyota'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe'
DELETE FROM cars WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01')
DELETE FROM car_inventory WHERE car_year < 2015 AND price > 20000;
